title: MCINDS Nursing Assessment Entry
description: A schema representing a single nursing assessment based on MCINDS principles. It mandates provenance and coded clinical concepts.

entryId.description: Unique identifier for this data entry.

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the assessment was recorded.

provenance.description: The source of the data entry, critical for audit and liability.

author.description: The clinician responsible for signing off on this entry.

focus.description: The clinical focus of the assessment, using a standard terminology.

valueCodeableConcept.description: The outcome or value of the assessment.
